unnormalised: Athlete biographies offer valuable insights. Dr. Sharma’s work on Milkha Singh is inspiring. We learn about struggles, like training in Patiala, and triumphs, such as winning medals. Imagine practicing on a 400m track. Such stories fuel dedication. Property near that training center? Around Rs. 5000/sq ft.
